ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: This is a package for estimating the copula mixture model and plotting correspondence curves in "Measuring reproducibility of high-throughput experiments" (2011), Annals of Applied Statistics, Vol. 5, No. 3, 1752-1779, by Li, Brown, Huang, and Bickel

This is a package for estimating the copula mixture model and plotting correspondence curves in "Measuring reproducibility of high-throughput experiments" (2011), Annals of Applied Statistics, Vol. 5, No. 3, 1752-1779, by Li, Brown, Huang, and Bickel

name: r-idr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-idr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/idr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/idr/idr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6b3910dc48495439cd01828f8999823864a6712f73560ee3e6c903065c67d1e4

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('idr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('idr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=idr
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: This is a package for estimating the copula mixture model and plotting correspondence curves in "Measuring reproducibility of high-throughput experiments" (2011), Annals of Applied Statistics, Vol. 5, No. 3, 1752-1779, by Li, Brown, Huang, and Bickel
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: idr
# Type: Package
# Title: Irreproducible discovery rate
# Version: 1.2
# Date: 2014-08-15
# Author: Qunhua Li
# Maintainer: Qunhua Li <qunhua.li@gmail.com>
# Description: This is a package for estimating the copula mixture model and plotting correspondence curves in "Measuring reproducibility of high-throughput experiments" (2011), Annals of Applied Statistics, Vol. 5, No. 3, 1752-1779, by Li, Brown, Huang, and Bickel
# License: GPL (>= 2.0)
# LazyLoad: yes
# Packaged: 2014-08-16 15:46:28 UTC; qul12
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2014-09-04 07:00:27
